alert.note: Alert for Sussex (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 22 at 1:36PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Sussex County through 215 PM EDT... At 136 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Green Plain, or 9 miles east of Emporia, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Reduced visibilty and minor flooding possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Sussex and Stony Creek around 215 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Yale, Gray, Mason, Booker and Hilda. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: Be prepared for rapid changes in weather and road conditions. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
